description:
For the Monaco Cup qualifying match, Kawachi proposes that they make a bread modeled after Rodin’s famous sculpture, “The Thinker.” The catch? He has to stay inside the bread sculpture during the competition! Can he possibly make it?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: An Explosive Situation!! The Forbidden Rodin Tactic!
Situation explosive ! La plan Rodin interdit !
สถานการณ์ตึงเครียด!! แผนโรแดงต้องห้าม!
一触即発!! 禁断のロダン作戦!
